item.title: DFS
item.description: score:123 Chances: With investors and bankers confident that interest rates won’t be heading higher in the coming years, merger activity has accelerated The acquisition aims to create a bigger competitor to Visa and Mastercard, potentially disrupting the close-knit U.S. credit card industry Risks: Antitrust concerns and questions about how the merger will affect customers Democrat Congresswoman Maxine Waters is deeply opposed to the acquisition Score:123 chances characters count - risks characters count = 123
